EmailTemplate.description: This Template will be used to send mails to BU Admin for non action on CCR by DMM
EmailTemplate.name: BU Admin Email Template for CCR
EmailTemplate.subject: No Action on CCR {!Opportunity.NDR_Quote_Document_Number__c}{!Opportunity.End_Customer_Name__c} / {!Opportunity.NDR_Sold_to_Account_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear BU Admin,
An CCR has been submitted for approval to the respective Channel Sales Person {!Opportunity.OwnerFullName} three days ago. No action has been taken. Please notify the channel sales person and respective RSM that action is required.
Click on the link to access the CCR directly:
{!Opportunity.NDR_Quote_Document_Number__c}
Regards
TE Team
